explanation:
To determine whether MHD_str_has_token_caseless_ participates in direct or indirect recursion you must examine every function it calls and the functions those call, to see if any path returns to MHD_str_has_token_caseless_.

- charsequalcaseless: This function is invoked directly by MHD_str_has_token_caseless_, so its body must be inspected to see whether it (directly or indirectly) calls back the target.
- isasciiupper: According to the static call graph, charsequalcaseless calls isasciiupper; therefore isasciiupper (and any functions it calls) must be inspected to ensure there is no path back to MHD_str_has_token_caseless_.

(If further callees are discovered when inspecting these symbols, they must likewise be included to complete the recursion check.)
